per_frame_1=bass_clip = above(bass_att,bass_clip)*2 + (1-above(bass_att,bass_clip))*((bass_clip-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_frame_2=time2 = time2 + bass_att*bass_att*0.04 + 0.1*equal(bass_clip,2);
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=echo_orient = 1;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=ib_r = ib_r + 0.5*sin(time*0.899 + x*4);
per_frame_7=ib_g = ib_g + 0.5*sin(time*0.687 + y*5);
per_frame_8=ib_b = ib_b + 0.5*sin(time*1.225);
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=ob_r = ob_r + 0.5*sin(time*0.999 + x*4);
per_frame_11=ob_g = ob_g + 0.5*sin(time*0.787 + y*5);
per_frame_12=ob_b = ob_b + 0.5*sin(time*1.45);
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=q5 = time2;
per_pixel_1=//use simple fuzzy logic to model zooming
per_pixel_2=
per_pixel_3=//rules
per_pixel_4=fuzzy1 = pow(x,2)*2;
per_pixel_5=fuzzy3 = -pow((x-1),2)*2;
per_pixel_6=fuzzy2 = pow(y,2)*2;
per_pixel_7=fuzzy4 = -pow((y-1),2)*2;
per_pixel_8=
per_pixel_9=
per_pixel_10=//activations approx sawtooth with sin curve
per_pixel_11=f1 = sin(q5 - 1.5707);
per_pixel_12=f2 = sin(q5);
per_pixel_13=f3 = sin(q5 + 1.5707);
per_pixel_14=f4 = sin(q5 + 3.14);
per_pixel_15=
per_pixel_16=//take only values above zero
per_pixel_17=f1 = f1*above(f1,0);
per_pixel_18=f2 = f2*above(f2,0);
per_pixel_19=f3 = f3*above(f3,0);
per_pixel_20=f4 = f4*above(f4,0);
per_pixel_21=
per_pixel_22=//sum rule ativations
per_pixel_23=sum_fuzzy = fuzzy1*f1 + fuzzy2*f2 - fuzzy3*f3 - fuzzy4*f4;
per_pixel_24=
per_pixel_25=zoom = 0.98 + 0.2*sin(q1*0.1) + 0.1*rad  - sum_fuzzy*0.4*rad;
per_pixel_26=rot = sum_fuzzy*0.2*rad;
